text: Armağan Çağlayan (born 8 April 1966) is a Turkish television producer and lawyer. == Career == Çağlayan taught Creativity in Communication as a research assistant at the Faculty of Art and Design at Istanbul Kültür University and lectured at the Public Relations and Advertising and Visual Communication departments at Beykent University.http://www.beykent.edu.tr/WebProjects/Uploads/Arma%F0an%20%C7a%F0layan.pdf He later worked as a columnist and conducted interviews for Radikal newspaper. On 3 February 2016, he started writing for Nokta magazine. In April 2017, Çağlayan continued his career by preparing reports for Posta, and a month later left his position as a journalist and joined Kanal D on 8 June 2017. 17 Following the sale of Kanal D to Demirören Media Group on 17 May 2018, he was dismissed along with many other media employees. On 14 March 2018, he joined Popstar 2018 singing contest as a judge. However, this program did not reach the required rating and made an early final on 23 May 2018. == References == == External links == * Official website Category:1966 births Category:Istanbul University Faculty of Law alumni Category:Beykent University faculty Category:Turkish lawyers Category:Living people Category:Turkish television producers
